oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cossitt - Inverted
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cossitt Library; libraries;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This early photo of Cossitt Library plays a visual trick on the viewer. It is inverted; the photo shows the south side of the library, though it seems the facade of the building is facing the wrong direction. The angle of the shot creates some distortion as well in regards to the library's position next to the Customs House.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: black & white photo, mounted, 10 x 8 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
